content: Hi FHIR developers! We are having a contest for FHIR developers and welcome you to build an application that uses InterSystems IRIS for Health FHIR Server. This is the online contest that will take place from 10th to 30th of August on the InterSystems Developers community. Everybody is very welcome! Learn more information here https://community.intersystems.com/post/welcome-intersystems-iris-health-fhir-contest-developers We have a kick-off webinar tomorrow http://eventbrite.com/e/116225065299
